name: Stage Drop
description:
3D Platformer with Jump'n'Run elements divided in three different stages unlocked one after another.  Each stage has a different goal you need to fulfill before you die  or the stage falls apart which happens over time.

Stage 1: Your goal is to collect five diamonds scattered across the map.

Stage 2: You need to get to the golden sphere at the top of the stage.

Stage 3: You need to defeat the final boss (work in progress)

The game is in a playable state but needs quiet a bit of polishing. Hopefully I'll find time to complete it in the future.

Free to use content I added to my game:

Skybox Material: Free HDR Sky https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/free-hdr-sky-612...
Character Model: Micro Rooster Rudy - Smashy Craft Series https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/animals/micro-rooster-rudy-s...
Enemy Model: Fantasy Bee https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/animals/fantasy-bee-135487
Diamond Model: Simple Gems Ultimate Animated Customizable Pack https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/simple-gems-ultimate-animated-cus...
StageBackgroundMusic: TheFatRat - Windfall https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCa_UMppcMsHIzb5LDx1u9zQ
MainMenuMusic: CodeManu - Intro Theme https://opengameart.org/content/platformer-game-music-pack
